data.title: Andy Roddick
data.text:
Name:Andrew "Andy" Stephen Roddick

DOB:August 30, 1982

Birthplace:Omaha, Nebraska

Residence: Boca Raton, Florida

Family: Mother Blanche, Father Jerry, and two older brothers. Lawrence is a chiropractor in San Antonio, TX; John is an assisstant tennis coach at Georgia State University.

Height:6'2"

Weight: 180-ish

Shoe Size:12

Plays:Right-handed

Turned Pro: 2000

Fastest Serve: 142mph

Music:everything, but classical

Fave Bands:Lifehouse, Sublime, Dixie Chicks, Dave Mathews, Beatles, Outkast

Most Embarassing Moment: being taken off the court by his mom *lol*

Hobbies: Golf and Basketball

Car: Mercedes SUV

Speaks:English and Spanish

Fave City to Play:Miami

Fave Tourney:Ericson

Fave US Sportsman:Lance Armstrong

Fave Food:Pizza

Pets:A dog and a cat

Fave TV Shows: South Park, Temptation Island, Who's Line Is It Anyway?

Fave Author:John Grisham

Fave Movies:American Pie, Austin Powers, Save the Last dance

Fave Video Game:All Sports Games

Fave Basketball Team:Miami Heat

Fave Baseball Team:Marlins

Fave Song:"Hanging by a Moment" by Lifehouse

Fave Actor:Adam Sandler

Fave Actress:Sandra Bullock and Julia Roberts

Fave Subject:History

Fave Color:Black "It goes with anything"

Fave Vacation Place:Hawaii
